tool_description: Provides access to scraped crunchbase company data
name: Crunchbase Company Data
title: Crunchbase Company Data

api_list.name: Get Id by Name
api_list.description: Given a company's name string as input, returns crunchbase's unque id for that company. That unique id can then be used to pull additional information about the company.

api_list.name: Get All Data by Name
api_list.description: Given a company's name string, the endpoint returns all available Crunchbase data on this company.

api_list.name: Get Investors Data by Name
api_list.description: Given a company's name string as input, returns a real-time scrape of all available investor data from Crunchbase

api_list.name: Get Id by Domain
api_list.description: Given a company's domain as input, returns CrunchBase's unique id for that company. Be aware, can provide erroneous results with Crunchbase has two entries for the same company. For example, plugging in snapchat.com returns the incorrect id for Snapchat whereas plugging in snap.com returns the correct info.

api_list.name: Get All Cb Data By Id
api_list.description: Given a company's id, the endpoint returns all availalbe crunchbase data for this company.

api_list.name: Get Funding Data by Name
api_list.description: Given a company name string, returns all available funding data on that company scraped from crunchbase in real time.

api_list.name: Get Acquisitions Data by Id
api_list.description: Given a company's id as input, returns a real-time scrape of all available acquisition data from Crunchbase - i.e. all the acquisitions made by the company id provided

api_list.name: Get People Data by Id
api_list.description: Given a company's unique id as input, returns a real-time scrape of all available people data from Crunchbase.

api_list.name: Get Funding Data by Id
api_list.description: Given a company's unique id as input, returns all available funding data from a real-time scrape of Crunchbase.

api_list.name: Get Investors Data by Id
api_list.description: Given a company's Crunchbase id, returns a real-time scrape of all available investor data from Crunchbase.

api_list.name: Get Acquisitions Data by Name
api_list.description: Given a company's name string as input, returns a real-time scrape of all available acquisitions data from Crunchbase

api_list.name: Get People Data by Name
api_list.description: Given a company's name string as input, returns all available data about senior people at the company from crunchbase.
